name: Instruction
tagline: This is where all the instructions will be stored
body:
### Welcome to the instruction repository.
This repository will be your guide into everything GitHub related. To set up git, follow the instructions below

To access the repository directly without any downloads, press the blue "github" button in the top right corner.

**Windows**
To set up git on windows, follow the [github](https://help.github.com/articles/set-up-git#platform-windows) link!

**Linux**
To set up git on linux, follow the [github](https://help.github.com/articles/set-up-git#platform-linux) link!

**Mac**
TO set up git on mac, follow the [github](https://help.github.com/articles/set-up-git#platform-mac) link!


If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.



### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this repository? Contact heanssgen.troy.micheal@gmail.com and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
